title: Constructivist-Based Science Inquiry Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary science curriculum and basic experimental design skills
context.additional_context: Elementary school teachers performing roles as science education specialists in corporate settings, conducting mobile learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design at least one science inquiry scenario applying the three core principles of constructivism (active, collaborative, and authentic learning)
Learners can perform peer assessment and feedback exchanges using mobile-based collaboration tools at least twice
Learners can develop an evaluation rubric that applies context-specific science learning problems to real educational settings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
